events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been identified as a refund request due to incorrect item delivery as described by the customer.
Customer service agent Jessica M. has been assigned to handle the refund case for the customer.
Hello, I’m Jessica from customer support. I’m here to help you with your refund request today.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so I can verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is 874932 and I have attached a photo showing the item I received, which is not what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method immediately and provide instructions for returning the incorrect item.
Thanks for the quick response and refund offer. I appreciate your help sorting this out quickly.
The refund has been successfully processed and return instructions sent to your registered email address.
Just checking in to ensure you received the refund and that everything is satisfactory with the resolution.
The case has been closed as the refund was confirmed received and customer expressed satisfaction with the service.
A satisfaction survey link has been sent to the customer to collect feedback on their support experience.
